rooms.description: Large, open space near the entrance to welcome positive energy. Vastu compliant by facing north-east direction.
Functional kitchen placed in the southeast corner for auspiciousness and proper ventilation.
Multi-functional space serving as a bedroom, work area, and relaxation zone. Vastu alignment: west side to promote creativity.
Compact bathroom adjacent to the studio bedroom ensuring privacy while maintaining good energy flow.
Designated media room with soundproofing, placed on the west side for calm ambiance in alignment with Vastu principles.

openings.description: Placed at north-east to invite positive energy according to Vastu, with a robust design in line with Brutalist aesthetics.
Large windows strategically positioned for natural light and cross ventilation. Maintains Brutalist design principles with raw concrete finishes.
